content.heading: Save 10% off your Ulster Bank Car Insurance discount premium, in addition to other Ulster Bank Car Insurance discounts which you may be eligible for
content.content: You need to apply for this benefit.
As a ufirstgold member, you are eligible for a __10% discount__ off your first year's Ulster Bank Car Insurance discount premium, in addition to other Car discounts which you may be eligible for

__Ulster Bank Car Insurance 10% discount is something every driver needs - and getting the best value cover is something every driver wants__

Ulster Bank Car Insurance is introduced by Ulster Bank Ireland DAC and underwritten and administered by Aviva Insurance Limited.

For an instant quote or to arrange immediate cover, call Ulster Bank on *[1890 700 800](tel:1890700800)*, ensuring you inform the Customer Support Team that you are a ufirstgold member. Lines are open Monday to Friday 9am - 6pm. Please be advised calls are recorded for training and quality assurance purposes

Please note the monthly account fee for the ufirstgold current account is €14.

To make a claim please call Aviva on

 *[1890 601 890](tel:1890601890)* 

Lines are open Monday to Friday 9am-5pm

Calls from mobile phones may not be free.

metaData.heading: Here's what other people are asking

content.heading: Can I open more than one packaged account?

content.content: If you already hold a packaged account from Ulster Bank and are satisfied to open an additional packaged account, please note that there may not be any additional advantage for you opening another account for the following: Travel Service, Airport Lounge Access, Tailored Personal Loan Rates, Tailored Mortgage Rates, Commission Free Travel Money, Worldwide Travel Insurance and Car Insurance discount (if you have more than two packaged accounts). You will also be charged an additional monthly membership fee on the new packaged account.

content.heading: Are all the benefits available if I live abroad?

content.content: If you are living abroad or plan on living abroad, it is important to note that some of the benefits attached to your account are only available when you are visiting the Republic of Ireland or when you are resident in the Republic of Ireland. For further information please call ufirstgold Membership Services on *[1890 946 486](tel:1890946486)* or from outside the Republic of Ireland call *[00 44 2392 676 738](tel:00442392676738)*.

This insurance discount is only in force for as long as you have your ufirstgold Current Account.

Discounts are applied consecutively to your individual premium. Subject to a minimum premium of €280. Underwriting and acceptance criteria apply.

Ulster Bank Car Insurance is introduced by Ulster Bank Ireland DAC and underwritten and administered by Aviva Insurance Limited. Ulster Bank Ireland DAC is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland. Aviva Insurance Limited, trading as Aviva, is authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority in the UK and is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland for conduct of business rules. Registered Branch Office in Ireland No 900175. Registered Branch Address: One Park Place, Hatch Street, Dublin 2. Registered in Scotland No 2116. Registered Office Pitheavlis, Perth PH2 0NH.
